capability.name: Investment Portfolio Management
capability.definition: Manage an investment portfolio, initiating trading to leverage market opportunities, remaining within portfolio trading policies
capability.role: Orchestrate the investment/ rebalancing of an investment portfolio to optimize gains remaining within the terms of the portfolio 'charter' or agreement
capability.example: An investment manager monitoring the markets determines that an identified opportunity can be exploited for the portfolio, remaining in line with the portfolio policies

key_features.name: Monitor market for opportunities/threats
key_features.description: Enables monitor market for opportunities/threats to support manage an investment portfolio, initiating trading to leverage market opportunities, remaining within portfolio trading policies

key_features.name: Match identified trading opportunity to investment portfolio policies
key_features.description: Enables match identified trading opportunity to investment portfolio policies to support manage an investment portfolio, initiating trading to leverage market opportunities, remaining within portfolio trading policies

key_features.name: Initiate market trades to rebalance/improve portfolio make-up
